Class EncryptionUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities.EncryptionUtilities

  • public class EncryptionUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilizing logic from these links: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40123319/easy-way-to-encrypt-decrypt-string-in-android https://nelenkov.blogspot.com/2012/04/using-password-based-encryption-on.html Created by pmacdowell on 2018-01-08.

    • Method Detail

      • setCharSetPreference

        public static void setCharSetPreference(@NonNull
                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charSetPreference)
        Set the charset (IE, 'UTF-8'). If this is never set, all calls will default to UTF-8
        Parameters:
        charSetPreference - StandardCharsets Charsets that WILL work: StandardCharsets.UTF_8 StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1 StandardCharsets.US_ASCII Charsets that will NOT work: StandardCharsets.UTF_16 StandardCharsets.UTF_16BE StandardCharsets.UTF_16LE

      • setBypassLength16SaltHashing

        public static void setBypassLength16SaltHashing(boolean bypassLength16SaltHashing)
        Set the bypass length 16 salt hash bool. If this is never set, will default to false
        Parameters:
        bypassLength16SaltHashing - If this is true and a salt of length 16 is passed in, the string / byte[] will not be hashed using MD5. If false, any String / byte[] will be hashed using MD5
